Author: SaintAelphaba
Text: I completely understand how you feel, I've been there, but let me say this - you look AMAZING. On the day you will feel so incredible - surrounded by all the people who love you most, hair and makeup done, being celebrated just for being you and making this commitment to the person you love. Don't even worry about those 20lbs. They don't matter. You'll be whisked away in the excitement and before you know it the day will be over and you'll be married and will have had a wonderful time.
